Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its value and your interest, I believe it's a perfect match for your needs. I'm offering you the chance to own this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $9500. This offer is exclusive to you and won't be available to others. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
